text: From 2-26 September 2014, the Kashmir region of South Asia witnessed heavy floods across a large part of its districts. This was caused by heavy rainfall. In Jammu & Kashmir in India, as well as Azad Kashmir, Gilgit- Baltistan and Punjab in Pakistan, were affected by these floods. 566 people died due to the floods in this area. == References == Category:2014 disasters Pakistan floods Category:2010s disasters in India Category:2010s floods Category:2010s disasters in Pakistan 2014 Pakistan Category:Floods in Pakistan Category:Jammu and Kashmir Category:September 2014 events Category:2014 in Pakistan
